transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Namaskar sir.

Executive: Namaskar boliye. Hello, Lakhan baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Lakhan baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. 161 organization se baat kar rahe hain. Main jaan sakta hun.

Customer: Harsha Gate se baat kar raha hun.

Executive: Kisse sir?

Customer: Harsha Gate se baat kar raha hun main.

Executive: Okay sir, okay. To sir aapka ek kuch concern tha aapne sir ticket raise kiya tha.

Customer: To main jaan sakta hun aapko kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir?

Executive: Ticket raise kiya tha wo to close ho gaya tha na.

Customer: Kya sir?

Executive: Ticket raise kiya tha. Ji. Wo manager jo change hua tha mera isliye.

Executive: Achcha. Hello. Haan. To wo to close ho gaya tha na uske baad maine kab kiya ticket?

Customer: Nahi sir aapki ticket aaj fir aayi hai. To maine dekha to wo fir se show ho raha hai. To aapne aapne customer care pe call wagaira kiya hoga.

Executive: Customer care pe call kiya tha aapse baat karne ke liye. Lekin waha call hi receive nahi hua.

Customer: Achcha. Achcha mujhse baat karne ke liye aapko call lagaya tha maine. Dikkat kya hai dikkat ka sawal nahi hai.

Executive: Achcha. Achcha. Wo Aditya ji Aditya ji the na. To hafte mein ek baar call kar lete the kuch problem hoti thi to main bata deta tha. Par main bhi call kar leta tha to main agar raat ko bhi call karta tha na to wo turant receive karke jawab dete the.

Customer: Nahi sir mera call laga nahi tha kya?

Executive: Aapka call laga tha na pura ring baja lekin kisi ne receive hi nahi kiya uthaya hi nahi do baar call lagaya to fir apna ticket raise ho gaya udhar.

Customer: Haan sir. Sir kab kab lagaya tha aapne?

Executive: Shanivar ke Saturday ko.

Executive: Achcha Saturday ko. Actually dopahar mein lagaya tha wo bhi. Sir maine na actually na main do din ke liye waha pe matlab Saturday Sunday hamara off hota hai wo aapko pata hai.

Customer: To wo main na gaon mein gaya tha. To sir aapko pata hai gaon mein network ka kya problem rehta hai. Maine do teen bari main aapko dikha sakta hun main aapko aapne shayad 12:00 baje ke something mujhe lagta hai try kiya. 1:00 baje ke baad kiya tha maine 1:00 1:30 baje ke 2:00 baje ke beech mein kiya tha maine. Haan wo main aapko main wo aapko dikha sakta hun ki maine apni taraf se try kiya tha. Nahi nahi wo koi dikkat nahi hai dikhane ki dikkat nahi hai. Par aapne call receive nahi kiya mujhe kuch puchna tha kuch kaam tha isliye us waqt mein. Nahi bataiye sir kya kya kaam hai bataiye.

Executive: Ek to jabhi main free tha to system pe baith ke thoda wo sudharna bhi tha jo leads wagaira jo aisi aa rahi hai na. Wo main fir se aapko call karunga system pe baith ke. Aur leads wagaira sahi nahi aa rahi sab bigad gayi hai sab bekar leads aa rahi hai bina kaam ki. Achcha. To usko zara optimize karo ki jo kya bolte hain category hai usko dekho kaun si category ki leads pad rahi hai kuch kaam ki nahi hai wo mere. Nahi wo to sahi hai sir wo to main kar dunga lekin jab se renew karaya hai na pack pack renew karaya hai na jab se leads sari bekar aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan sari leads bekar ho gayi hain. Bekar aa rahi hai kuch kaam ki nahi hai plastic ke beads aa rahe hain pata nahi kya kya aa rahe hain wo main mera kaam thodi hai wo.

Executive: Achcha matlab plastic wagaira ka kuch aa raha hai kya?

Customer: Plastic ke beads aa rahe hain glass ke beads aa rahe hain.

Executive: Achcha ye ye lead sir kab aayi thi ye bata payenge?

Customer: Ye lead continue aa rahi hai aisi aisi lead continue kitne din se aa rahi hai main open karta hun na kuch kaam ki lead hi nahi hoti main isliye open bhi nahi karta hun.

Executive: Achcha. Kuch lead aisi aati hai sir ek cheez aur bata dun main leads aati hai na. Hmm. To samajh lo ek second bhi nahi hota hai main uthata hun to wo purchase hui hoti hai already. To matlab leads mere andar lead padti hai iska matlab ye hai.

Customer: Achcha jab aap dekhte hain ki to wo lead already sold dikhata hai.

Executive: Haan. To itni fast to matlab ek second bhi nahi hota purchase ho jati hai to itni fast to matlab mere paas old old lead aa rahi hai na jo purchase ho uske baad padta hai mere andar.

Customer: Aap main actually kya aap notification se jaate hain kya? Ki aapke paas notification aaya uske through jaate hain kya aap?

Executive: Notification aata hai mere andar turant lead padti hai jaise lead padti hai to tune to bajti hai mobile mein.

Customer: Sir main actually kya bataun notification se na aap kam hi lead consume kijiye notification ka kya hai ki notification refresh nahi hota hai matlab. Notification aapne bhi dekha hoga jab kai bari aap apne jo private applications hote hain wo use karte hain to kai bari kafi time lag jata hai notifications ko aane mein. To hame lagta hai ki wo abhi recent mein hi recent ka hi hai lekin wo purana hota hai. To main aapko suggest karunga sir aap notifications ke through leads pe thoda na jaaye aur aap system se dekhen jo bhi leads hain sir. Ye mera aapko personal suggestion rahega notification ka sir problem hi rehta hai notification thoda late wagaira jaate hain.

Executive: Pata hai system system hai na sir wo ek bar mein kam se kam aap ye man lijiye din mein kitni sari leads and inquiries generate hoti hain to uske hisab se kitne sare notifications jaate honge ye aapko pata hai. Inquiry to chalo direct aa jati hai. Nahi wo koi dikkat nahi bata raha hun sir lead jo leads aati hai na leads ke through matlab notifications ke through sir aap leads pe thoda na jaaye to main aapko suggest kar raha hun. To sir aap na kabhi bhi mujhe connect kar lijiye din mein jab aap free ho main video call pe aapko lunga aur aap apni categories check kar lena ki properly map hai ki nahi. Thik hai sir?

Customer: Wo to aisa hota abhi bhi dekh sakte ho.

Executive: Nahi wo to main abhi abhi dekh leta hun. Actually kya hai ki sir usme na aapko pata aap jo aapke products hai na uski thodi categories ki knowledge aapko thodi si jyada hogi. Hmm. To isliye main aapko thoda video call video meet pe le leta hun aur kuch nahi main dekh dekh leta hun.

Customer: Maine on kiya hai. Mera na yahi number hai aap jab bhi try kare kya aapne pehle save nahi kar paye the kya?

Executive: Nahi pehle save nahi kar paya tha to main application ke andar se ja ke aapko call lagaya tha.

Customer: Achcha. To koi baat nahi sir ab aap is bar save kar lijiye aur koi agar aapko dikkat ho to wo aap mujhe direct connect kar lijiye aapki. To aapko direct hi connect kiya tha maine sir.

Executive: Achcha aapke paas tha mera number?

Customer: Maine jo mera app hai na mobile mein IndiaMART ka uske andar aapka number show ho raha hai mera manager jo relationship manager aapka photo ke sath number aa raha hai. Uspe se maine call kiya tha aapko.

Executive: Actually kya tha main gaon chala gaya tha to waha pe na network ka thoda issue rehta hai to matlab maine aapko try kiya tha kam se kam paanch che bar try kiya tha to wo 4G dikha raha tha network wo laga hi nahi maine frequently try kiya tha. To koi dikkat nahi sir main bol raha hun aapka. Dekho ye abhi maine open kiya na system.

Customer: Hmm. Abhi starting mein ye starting mein hi leads show dikha raha hai na. Sara mere kaam ka hi nahi hai.

Executive: Achcha. Main dekh leta hun main. Abhi jo aapko leads dikha raha hai wo recent recent wali main dekh leta hun. Recent recent wali mein dekho second haan fan sir ye fancy agate stone kuch karke dikha raha hai.

Customer: Haan ye sare lekin ye sare artificial stone hai. Sare glass ke hai dekho aap photo ke sath dikha rahe hain.

Executive: Achcha kaam ke nahi hai ye artificial hi dikha raha hai. Hmm. Iske niche wala wo bhi glass hai.

Customer: Achcha ye jo niche crystal ball with wooden base. Achcha. White selenite crystal heart 2 inch white selenite crystal wo thik hai lekin white selenite crystal ki jo lead hai na wo mere kaam ki nahi hai kyuki wo khambat se hi hai jahan se main hun wahin se hi hai.

Executive: Achcha. Hmm iske niche wala dekho black plastic black plastic. Haan black plastic snow globe size itna matlab. Chalo sir main categories aap categories aapki dekh leta hun ye product ki. Ye bhi kaam ka nahi hai iske niche wala bhi kaam ka nahi hai. Sir. Achcha ye aapke kaam ka nahi hai ek minute main isko na. Not relevant. Sir aap aap na ise not relevant mark kar dijiye jitna bhi aapke kaam ka nahi dikh raha hai na. Aise sir kitna karunga isse pehle bhi maine do din pehle bhi sara not relevant kiya delete kiya sara. Achcha iske niche jaoge na aur bhi sara bina kaam ka list lead hai jitna bhi hai sab bina kaam ka hai.

Customer: Achcha. Chalo thik hai sir main dekh leta hun aur aap na aapko na main connect karta hun. Sir main ye ticket close kar dun?

Executive: Haan close kar do isko. Haan haan. Haan main puchna padta hai sabko. Thik hai main close kar deta hun. Aur main aapki wo jo categories hai wo dekh dekh leta hun sir. Wo hello. Haan haan. Thik hai sir? Main aapki jo categories hai wo ek bar dekh leta hun. Sir iske liye na aapko thoda sa time nikal paate to sir main behtari matlab achche se kar pata. Ki kya hai ki aapko thoda sa na categories ka aapko idea achcha hoga kyuki main problem ye categories ki wajah se hi aa raha hai. Main ek ek karke aapke sare hi products dekh leta aur aap mujhe bata dete haan isme ye categories achche se map hai. Thik hai.

Customer: Haan to kab sir main connect kar paunga aapko bata payenge aap? Ki aapka hona jaruri hai kyuki kya hai ki iske liye sahi rahega sir jo bhi hai. To ek kaam kijiye na abhi system pe hi baithe ho aap?

Executive: Ji bilkul main abhi baitha hun aap abhi main aapko connect karun?

Customer: To haan abhi abhi kar de ek kaam karo kitna time lagega abhi. Main abhi aapko connect kar leta hun. Ek minute main connect karta hun.

Executive: Aur sir abhi recent deal kab hui hai aapki IndiaMART ke through?

Customer: Hello. Recent abhi deal? Haan sir. Abhi to koi deal nahi hui is mahine bhi nahi hui pichhle mahine bhi nahi hui.

Executive: Achcha koi deal nahi ho paayi hai?

Customer: Nahi. To kahan pe matlab yahi dikkat aa rahi hai sir aapko main to?

Executive: Hmm. Achcha chalo main dekh leta hun sir ho jayegi solve aisi baat nahi hai. Sir dekhna maine link bheja aapko. Aap usse join kar lijiye. WhatsApp pe bheja hai kahan bheja hai? Nahi mail pe aaya hoga aapke us pe.

Customer: Join karna hai isse.

Executive: Aa gaya sir?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Sir join kar lijiye sir. Ek second.

Customer: Join kiya sir aapne? Haan. Join kiya.

Executive: Dikha nahi raha hai aapko abhi.

Customer: Tamaro call hold par mukvama aavyo chhe. Kripa karine line par raho. Aapke call ko hold par rakha gaya hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. Your call is on hold. Please stay online or call back later. Tamaro call hold par mukvama aavyo chhe. Kripa karine line par raho. Aapke call ko hold par rakha gaya hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. Your call is on hold. Please stay online or call back later.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Tamaro call hold par mukvama aavyo chhe. Kripa karine line par raho. Aapke call ko hold par rakha gaya hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. Your call is on hold. Please stay online or call back later. Tamaro call hold
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer's call was not received earlier.

- Wants categories to be optimized.

- Leads are showing as purchased immediately.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested checking leads from system.

- Executive offered a video call to check categories.

- Ticket will be closed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect for video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, categories, subscription, network
